title: Zombie
description: Listless, humanoid corpses, reanimated as guardians by powerful clerics or wizards.
extras: Guardians: Always attack on sight.	Initiative: Always lose (no roll).	Undead: Make no noise, until they attack. Immune to effects that affect living creatures (e.g. poison). Immune to mind-affecting or mind-reading spells (e.g. charm, hold, sleep).
